review: The best part of the Fire TV Stick was how easy it was to set-up and connect my different accounts to. However, the search feature is not great within the different 'apps'. In order to search you have to scroll through a linear line of letters and if you want to delete you need to scroll all the way to the right of the letter list. While the search function is dynamic and will pull up titles as you enter in letters so you don't have to type an entire title, I wish that this list was more like Apple TV's search input.  Some of the apps you also have to activate online (using a computer, phone or tablet).
author: Kailey R.
